page.title: 13The Boat Trip (continued).
page.content: {May 22nd}At eleven o'clock,twelve of us and Mrs.Dench went on a boat trip around the island.There was a tractor that towed a boat to the waters edge.Six of us and Mrs.Dench went on first.The boat took us out to a boat called The Islander.Then the boat left us and went to get the others.We were near the Landing Beach at that point. When the others got into the boat we started the engine.The driver was called John Puddy.He is the administrator. We went north past Sugar Loaf and Ladies Beach and up past the Quarry Beach where we saw the ship wrecked Kaaksburg.It crashed four years ago. Then the boat went by Gull Rock where we saw some seals on rocks. We saw lots of Guillimots on rocks in bunches of up to a hundred.Then we saw a Puffin flying in a straight line across the sea by Brazen Ward.
